title: 13 LP missing since yesterday client crash :(
body:
I had 20LP when yestedays client crashed yersterday, i was in queue when i received ''server is bugged try later'' message, then today I win my first game of the day, gain 20LP, and somehow im now at 27lp... I mean if somehow the server thought id have dodged a game i'd be supposed to be missing only 5, wich wouldnt be so bad. But you know, 13LP isint cheap for an error that's not mine....

account : LE ROI CE MOE

replies.body:
Queue dodges should only cause a 10LP loss at max, as stated on our [Queue Dodging FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) I've never seen an instance where more than 10LP is lost. Did this only happen once?

We can't modify or grant LP after the loss has been recorded by the server, but if you continue to have issues disconnecting due to a technical issue, we can work to resolve that. Let me know if you have any questions.
It occured while I was in Queue and your N.A server went bust yesterday I think, since i hadn't managed to get in queue and this morning was missing 13 lp

Gotcha. I can't think of why you'd lose 13 LP unless it was a trend of disconnections from the queue and/or matches. If you have any other issues disconnecting from the server, please let me know and we can work to resolve it together.
